data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_68da456f9c01b2f88d29ee320db181ed.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Each time Cyclops hits an enemy with his skills, all his skill cooldowns are reduced by 0.5s.
Cyclops casts two Stardust Disks in the target direction, each dealing 275<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path.

Cyclops conjures Starlit Spheres around himself while gaining 50% Movement Speed that decays over 2s. The spheres will automatically seek and attack nearby enemies (prioritizes enemy heroes), exploding on collision and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the enemy. Enemies hit by multiple spheres will take reduced damage after the first hit.

Cyclops creates a Planetary Sphere and sends it after the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 500<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and immobilizing them for 0.75-1.5s (increases with travel distance).

data.name: Cyclops

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num2> extra Movement Speed and [C2Slow Immunity] for <Num1>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Suppress the enemy with high damage and frequent skill casts.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
The next Ultimate cast decreases other active skills' remaining cooldowns by 1.5 times within 4s.

<font color="8098ab">This only applies to the hero themselves</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 20s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: The next Ultimate cast decreases other active skills' remaining cooldowns by <Num2> times within <Num1>s.########[8098ab]This only applies to the hero themselves[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
The next Ultimate cast decreases other active skills' remaining cooldowns by 1.5 times within 4s.

<font color="8098ab">This only applies to the hero themselves</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 20s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Hybrid Lifesteal
+70 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Butterfly Goddess: For every 800 Magic Damage dealt to an enemy hero (calculated before Damage Reduction), a Butterfly Goddess is summoned to attack the enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of their current HP.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: Stream By Zing
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: A celestial traveler in the universe.

assist.desc: Cyclops is best with tanky heroes with strong CC skills, like Belerick and Minsitthar.

strong.desc: Cyclops' short skill cooldown makes him strong against mid-ranged heroes with poor Mobility, such as Terizla and Alpha.

weak.desc: Cyclops lacks Dash or Blink skills, making him the preferred target for heroes with gap closers and CC skills. Such as Lancelot, Alucard and Kagura.
